problem_summary_simple: Count valid sequences of picking up and delivering n orders, ensuring delivery is after pickup for each order.
problem_summary_technical: For each pair of pickup and delivery, there are i*(i-1)/2 valid arrangements, multiplied cumulatively.
key_insights: the problem can be solved by considering pairs of pickup and delivery
for the i-th order, there are 2i positions to place P_i and D_i
P_i must come before D_i, leading to (2i choose 1) / 2 = i choices for P_i, then D_i is fixed
